title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 146.1 - Purpose and general description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 146.1 - Purpose and general description

State Regulations
(a) This

Part implements Section
315
(4)
of the Executive Law. Section 315(4)
requires the division to prepare an annual report on the activities of the
division, and on developments in the effort to promote the utilization of
minority and women-owned business enterprises in State contracting
activity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
146.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 2, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 48, eff. 12/2/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
